about_the_game:
Imagined Worlds. Ruthless Conditions.

In a world where humanity’s survival hinges on a mysterious machine, players take on crucial roles to protect and maintain it. The Sanctuary, humanity's last refuge, requires constant care and resources. Portals have unleashed insectoid monsters, threatening the stability of this essential machine and humanity's future.

GAME FEATURES

Intense Combat and Exploration

Players take on the roles of Crafters, Observers, and Searchers, each with unique skills essential for survival. Crafters maintain and enhance the Facility, Observers gather resources and provide logistics, while Searchers ensure the team's survival amidst the monstrous threats.

Horror Elements and Facilities

Face horrifying creatures and navigate treacherous facilities, each with its own set of challenges and secrets. These elements combine to create an atmosphere of constant tension and excitement.

Resource Gathering and Extraction

Collect vital resources from the environment and from fallen enemies to sustain the Facility and craft essential items. Efficient resource management is crucial for long-term survival.

Crafting System

Engage in a straightforward crafting system, allowing players to build essential tools and weapons needed to fend off the ever-evolving threats.

Co-op Multiplayer

Team up with friends in cooperative multiplayer mode. Coordinate your roles, share resources, and strategize together to protect the Facility and ensure humanity’s survival. Cooperation and teamwork are key to overcoming the relentless threats.

Open World Exploration

Explore a world filled with mysterious events and horrifying creatures. Each encounter presents unique challenges and requires adaptive strategies to overcome.

Unique Skill System

Develop and enhance unique skills specific to each class, allowing for diverse playstyles and tactical approaches to the game’s challenges.

Personal Mini Vehicles

Navigate the open world with personal mini vehicles, enhancing mobility and providing strategic advantages in both exploration and combat.

In this relentless struggle for survival, every player’s role is crucial. Protect the machine, gather resources, and ensure humanity’s future in a world teeming with danger and mystery.

You can join our community on Discord. We would be delighted to have you join us!

content_descriptors.notes: There is no blood in this game; however, if aggressive creatures catch the player, the player dies and the game ends. To fit the horror theme, this event is violent and occurs quickly.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 64 Bit
  • Processor: Intel i5, 3rd gen (or equivalent)
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 660 or AMD Radeon HD 7870
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 64 Bit
  • Processor: Intel i5, 7th gen (or equivalent)
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA 970 / AMD Radeon 290
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
